snippet: Poland’s first openly gay and transsexual lawmakers took seats on the front bench of Parliament on Wednesday to protest hostile remarks by former President Lech Walesa.
abstract: Robert Biedron and Ann Grodzka, Poland's first openly gay and transsexual lawmakers, take seats on front bench of Parliament to protest hostile remarks by former Pres Lech Walesa.
lead_paragraph: Poland’s first openly gay and transsexual lawmakers took seats on the front bench of Parliament on Wednesday to protest hostile remarks by former President Lech Walesa.
